issue.title: [GLib] Add instructions to dev/release/README.md about creating source release on OS X, Linux
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-937](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-937). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because running the autotools setup for c_glib is necessary in the source build, there is additional environment setup required. This needs to work on at least OS X and Linux (and possibly include a Dockerfile).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-937?focusedCommentId=16682601) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
In https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/ARROW/Release+Management+Guide we direct release managers to the README for GLib to set up their environment to be able to build the project
